definition: the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: The appropriate direction lost many elites in those early annuals, it was under the archaic divine tree to fair cage him.
sentences.chinese: 当年正道损失无数精英，才将他困在上古神木之下。

sentences.english: Is this your joyous city, whose antiquity is of ancient days?
sentences.chinese: 这是你们欢乐的城，从上古而有的吗。

sentences.english: The arts of the Chu State is an antediluvian China's unique phenomenon with southern culture and artistic styles.
sentences.chinese: 楚美术是我国上古时期具有南方文化品格的艺术事象。

sentences.english: Dwarves took the primordial methods of producing titanscale armor from the titans and giants.
sentences.chinese: 矮人用来自泰坦和巨人的上古工艺制作泰坦鳞甲。

sentences.english: The museum has a large collection of sculptures dating from the ancient world.
sentences.chinese: 这个博物馆收藏有大量早自上古时代起的雕塑作品。

sentences.english: In ancient time, the Yin people deeply believed the religion of ghosts and gods.
sentences.chinese: 在上古时代，殷人信仰鬼神的宗教观念最为浓厚。

sentences.english: Characters of "Sun" Part in"Shuowen" contain the rich cultural information. of ancient society.
sentences.chinese: 《说文》“日”部字蕴含着丰富的上古社会文化信息。

sentences.english: This situation lasts till some day when a kylin appears suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 这种状态一直维持到某天一只上古麒麟的突然闯入。

sentences.english: In pre-qin dynasty, "the word" and "the saying" were two different kind articles.
sentences.chinese: 上古“言”和“语”是两种不同的文类。

sentences.english: The females procreation adoration is the origin and return of ancient goddess.
sentences.chinese: 女性生殖崇拜是上古女神的缘起和皈依。

sentences.english: Dragon is a deified animal worshipped by the Chinese people from the time immemorial.
sentences.chinese: 龙是中华民族自上古以来一直崇尚的神异动物。

sentences.english: Its origins can be traced back in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 它的起源可以追溯上古时代。

sentences.english: In ancient times, the Big Dipper was hidden by a monster suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 上古时代，天上的北斗七星突然被怪物藏匿起来。

sentences.english: Classic of Mountains and Rivers is an ancient writing coming down for more than two thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 《山海经》是一部流传了两千余年的上古时期的典籍。

sentences.english: In ancient times, the ceremony of praying for rain was a vivid display of a "Sympathetic Magic ".
sentences.chinese: 上古的求雨仪式是“交感巫术”的生动展现。

sentences.english: I thought about the former days, the years of long ago;
sentences.chinese: 我追想古时之日，上古之年。

definition: Fuxi or Fu Hsi, legendary Chinese emperor, trad. 2852-2738 BC, mythical creator of fishing, trapping and writing

Five Legendary Emperors, usually taken to be the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4] and four of his sons Zhuan Xu 顓頊|颛顼[Zhuan1 Xu1], Di Ku 帝嚳|帝喾[Di4 Ku4], Tang Yao 唐堯|唐尧[Tang2 Yao2], Yu Shun 虞舜[Yu2 Shun4]
Three Sovereigns, between Gods and Emperors in third millennium BC/usually listed as Suiren 燧人[Sui4 ren2], Fuxi 伏羲[Fu2 Xi1], trapping and writing, Shennong or Farmer God 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2]
medieval/Middle Ages/Chinese middle antiquity, 3rd to 9th centuries, including Sui and Tang Dynasties/Middle (of a language, e.g. Middle English)/used/second-hand
throughout time/from ancient times (up to the present)
Pangu (creator of the universe in Chinese mythology)
god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
